contents.Header2: Display album art while playing music

contents.Text: This will enable album art to be shown

contents.Header2: Display album art in the center

contents.Text: Enabled: This will put album art in the center of the screen
Disabled: This will put album art on the sidebar

contents.Header2: Auto-clear album art when music stops

contents.Text: Enabled: clears image from memory when the song stops
Disabled: Shows image forever untill the next song starts

Enabled: Writes the generated padding image to disk in the config directory, either next to the binary or in the global config directory (for more information see [[[button:Config location][../Config/Advanced Settings]]])
Disabled: Does not write the image to disk
Note: The value is temporarily stored in memory and is not saved persistently in the database. Consequently, it resets to `false` each time the program starts.
This pads images to center them and adds a effect on the padding area
Tick what options you want the randomizer to select when starting a new song
This menu is hidden when the randomizer is not selected as the "Image Padding Mode"
